title: Uchuujin Pipi
synopsis: An alien from another world lands on Earth and befriends a human boy. Pipi tends to help his human friends by giving them sound advice and sometimes using his advanced technology when needed. This is a drama which is mostly live actors and scenery. The main character, Pipi, and many of the special effects are animated.
staff: [['Wakabayashi, Ichirou', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Tomita, Isao', ['Music']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Inserted Song Performance']], ['Komatsu, Sakyou', ['Original Creator']]]
